author: أ ش أ
title: الأونروا: الأطفال فى غزة يموتون أمام أعيننا ولا نملك الوسائل لعلاجهم - اليوم السابع
text:
حذرت وكالة الأمم المتحدة لغوث وتشغيل اللاجئين الفلسطينيين ( أونروا ) من أن سوء التغذية بين الأطفال دون سن الخامسة قد تضاعف بين شهري مارس ويونيو، نتيجة للحصار الإسرائيلي على قطاع غزة.
وكانت المراكز الصحية والنقاط الطبية التابعة للأونروا قد أجرت - خلال هذه الفترة - ما يقرب من 74 ألف فحص للأطفال للكشف عن سوء التغذية، وحددت ما يقرب من 5,500 حالة من سوء التغذية الحاد الشامل وأكثر من 800 حالة من سوء التغذية الحاد الوخيم.
وذكرت الأونروا أنها عالجت أكثر من 3,500 طفل في غزة هذا العام من سوء التغذية، علاوة على ذلك، قدمت أكثر من 9 ملايين استشارة صحية منذ بداية الحرب، وهي تقدم حاليا حوالي 15 ألف استشارة يوميا. وأكدت أنه "لا يمكن لأي شريك صحي آخر في غزة تقديم الرعاية الصحية الأولية بهذا الحجم".
إلا أن الأونروا حذّرت من أن استمرارها في تقديم الخدمات يزداد صعوبة، مشيرة إلى أن ما لا يقل عن 188 من منشآتها - أي أكثر من نصف منشآت الأونروا في قطاع غزة - تقع داخل "المنطقة العسكرية الإسرائيلية"، أو في المناطق الخاضعة لأوامر التهجير، أو حيث تتداخل هذه الأوامر.
وقالت إن ستة فقط من مراكزها الصحية و22 نقطة طبية تابعة لها لا تزال تعمل، بالإضافة إلى 22 نقطة طبية متنقلة داخل وخارج الملاجئ التي تديرها.
وأكدت الأونروا أن خدماتها الطبية تعاني من نقص حاد في الموارد، محذرة من أن 57% من الإمدادات الطبية الأساسية قد نفدت لديها. وقالت: "الأطفال يموتون أمام أعيننا، لأننا لا نملك الإمدادات الطبية أو الغذاء المستدام لعلاجهم".
وأضافت أنه بسبب الحصار الإسرائيلي، نفدت الآن أدوية ضغط الدم، والأدوية المضادة للطفيليات، والأدوية المضادة للفطريات، وأدوية التهابات العيون، وجميع علاجات الجلد، والمضادات الحيوية الفموية للبالغين.
وأفادت الأونروا بأن بئرين فقط من آبارها المائية يعملان حاليا، مقارنة بعشرة آبار كانت تعمل قبل الحرب، كما تعمل 41 بئرا أصغر داخل ملاجئها، مضيفة أن القيود المفروضة على دخول الوقود لا تزال تُعرّض خدمات الإنقاذ لخطر التوقف الشديد إذا لم يُسمح بدخول إمدادات الوقود المستدامة إلى القطاع.
ومنذ شهرين، اضطرت الوكالة الأممية إلى وقف تقديم خدمات المياه والصرف الصحي في شمال غزة لحوالي 25 ألف نازح في الملاجئ بسبب أوامر التهجير الصادرة عن قوات الاحتلال الإسرائيلي.

author: Mirage News
title: Important Advocacy Efforts In Canberra | Mirage News
text: Advocacy in Canberra Last week, Mayor Cr Clare Le Serve, Deputy Mayor Cr Rochelle Halstead, and CEO Greg Box attended a series of pivotal meetings with Federal Ministers, Shadow Ministers, and representatives in Canberra as part of our advocacy program and key regional priorities. During these meetings, we emphasised the significance of advocacy and our vital role in representing Bass Coast, presenting the highest priorities for you, our community. This week provided a fantastic opportunity to foster relationships across government to advance critical advocacy issues for Bass Coast. Key topics included the importance of eco-tourism in our area, the Bass Coast Dinosaur Trail, our tracks and trails, regional development, transport, and the freight needs essential for enhancing both existing and future infrastructure. We also addressed further tourism opportunities, the impacts of coastal erosion in our region, and issues concerning affordable housing, social housing, and short-stay accommodation. Additionally, we had the fortuitous timing to meet with peers from other councils and local government associations, where we exchanged insights on financial sustainability and current pressures on local government. This series of meetings provided a valuable opportunity for Bass Coast to highlight key community priorities to parliamentary members, engage with peers, and share common themes and perspectives. We remain committed to advocating strongly for our region so we can build and grow together. The delegation met with a range of people including the following representatives: The Hon Jonathon Duniam, Shadow Minister for Environment and Water The Hon [Julie Collins,](https://www.linkedin.com/in/julie-collins-2b1b5091/) Minister Housing and Homelessness' The Hon [Michael Sukkar](https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelsukkarmp/) MP, Shadow Minister for Housing and Homelessness The Hon Kevin Hogan MP, Shadow Minister for Trade and Tourism The Hon Catherine King MP, Minister for Infrastructure, Transport, Regional Development and Local Government The Hon Darren Chester, Shadow Minister for Local Government and Regional Development The Hon Kristy McBain MP, Minister for Regional Development, Local Government and Territories Local member for Monash, Russell Broadbent MP Senator David Van Office of The Hon [Ted O'Brien MP](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tedobrienmp/), Shadow Minister for Climate Change [here](/important-advocacy-efforts-in-canberra-1274181/).

author: Marketing
title: Claudio e Roberto Sponchioni: il lavoro dei propri sogni è una scelta
text:
Roma, 31 gen. – Capita a molti di svegliarsi la mattina con un nodo allo stomaco sapendo che una nuova giornata lavorativa sta per iniziare. Questo capita quando non si è soddisfatti della propria occupazione attuale. La buona notizia, tuttavia, è che trovare il lavoro dei propri sogni e avviare una carriera di successo è possibile: tutto sta nel seguire il giusto metodo.
Per tutti coloro che desiderano valorizzare la propria carriera lavorativa ma non sanno come fare, esce oggi il libro dei fondatori di Jobiri.com Claudio e Roberto Sponchioni “TROVA IL LAVORO CHE TI FA FELICE. Scopri come il career coaching ti aiuta a trovare la carriera dei tuoi sogni”. Al suo interno, gli autori condividono con i propri lettori strumenti pratici e innovativi per trasformare i propri dubbi in azione e le paure in opportunità da sfruttare.
“Il nostro libro, edito da Jobiri Edizioni, è più di un manuale: è una guida pratica e strategica per chi vuole cambiare lavoro e ritrovare la felicità professionale. Offre soluzioni concrete per superare gli ostacoli al cambiamento, creare CV efficaci e ottimizzare il proprio profilo LinkedIn, oltre ad affrontare i colloqui e negoziare il proprio contratto in modo efficace” afferma Claudio Sponchioni, autore del libro. “Forti della nostra esperienza in questo settore, abbiamo scritto questo libro che fonde storie reali e strategie collaudate per accompagnare il lettore in una trasformazione professionale concreta” conclude Roberto Sponchioni, co-autore.
Sono tantissimi i professionisti, così come università, enti di formazione, sportelli lavoro, istituzioni pubbliche e private, orientatori e coach, che si rivolgono a Jobiri.com per usufruire della piattaforma basata su intelligenza artificiale e sui percorsi di career coaching. A dimostrazione di questo, Roberto e Claudio Sponchioni, spesso definiti come i papà del career coaching in Italia, si fanno portatori di un messaggio al quale più di 150.000 persone hanno già aderito: cambiare lavoro e rinascere professionalmente è possibile. Basta seguire un metodo già testato capace di valorizzare al massimo le competenze che ciascuno di noi sa di avere.
“Per un lavoratore, vivere in un contesto lavorativo che non sente proprio è qualcosa che inevitabilmente porta a generare stress e frustrazione” incalza Giacomo Bruno, CEO di Bruno Editore. “Per tale motivo, a fronte del successo ottenuto con la propria piattaforma, ecco che Roberto e Claudio Sponchioni hanno pensato bene di scrivere un libro rivolto a tutte quelle persone che sanno di meritare di più ma non sanno come fare per trasmettere al massimo il proprio valore professionale”.
“Ci siamo affidati al team di Giacomo Bruno per avere supporto sull’avvio di un nostro progetto editoriale, di cui questo primo libro rappresenta solo l’inizio” conclude Roberto Sponchioni, autore del libro. “Abbiamo trovato in Bruno Editore non solo un partner di grande esperienza, ma anche una squadra di professionisti che ci sta accompagnando in questo viaggio con competenza e passione”.

author: Kelly Martin
title: Riyadh International Philosophy Conference 2024: A New Calling for Thought Leaders
text:
Riyadh International Philosophy Conference 2024: A New Calling for Thought Leaders
[Kelly Martin](https://investorshangout.com/profile/view?id=79570)Updated: 12-05-2024 05:11 PM
Riyadh International Philosophy Conference 2024: An Enlightening Start
Over 60 Renowned Thinkers Gather to Explore "Philosophy and Quality of Life: Existence, Truth, and Goodness"
The Riyadh International Philosophy Conference 2024 has commenced its grand fourth edition at the prestigious King Fahad National Library, gathering esteemed philosophers and scholars to delve into the essence of existence and the impact of philosophy on enhancing quality of life. This year's theme focuses on the critical interplay of philosophy with human flourishing, aimed at understanding existence, truth, and goodness.
Opening Day Highlights: Prominent Speakers and Strategic Importance
The opening ceremony featured Dr. Mohammed bin Hasan Alwan, Chief Executive Officer of the Literature, Publishing, and Translation Commission, along with Mr. Ismaiel Almuhaithief, Chief Shared Services Officer of the Quality of Life Program. Their addresses underscored the conference's strategic alignment with the ambitious Saudi Vision 2030, aiming to position Riyadh as a central hub for philosophical discourse on a global stage.
Dr. Alwan articulated, "The Riyadh International Philosophy Conference stands as a crucial platform reflecting the Kingdom's commitment to fostering philosophical discussions. Today's events, characterized by their strategic topics, reinforce our dedication to intellectual collaboration while supporting the broader goals of improving the quality of life in our society."
Thematic Exploration: Mind, Body, and Spirit
The conference kicked off with a series of insightful presentations from renowned academics aimed at students and intellectual enthusiasts alike. Day one featured engaging keynote speeches and stimulating panel discussions addressing historical and contemporary perspectives on quality of life. Notable sessions included Dr. Robert Bernasconi's presentation on quantifying quality of life and philosophical critiques led by Dr. Kelly James Clark and Ms. Antonia Case.
Workshops titled "Humanity and Philosophy in Need of Each Other" and "Can I Not Choose?" witnessed enthusiastic participation from attendees eager to explore the complex relationship between philosophical thought and personal well-being. These sessions ignited discussions that resonate with the current societal needs for intellectual nourishment.
A Venue for Global Collaboration and Learning
Over 60 notable speakers graced the venue, including distinguished figures like Dr. Fausto Fraisopi and Dr. Abdelrahim Dekkoun. The conference also celebrated partnerships with respected international organizations like New Philosopher and The School of Life, illustrating a significant cultural exchange as they engage with Saudi Arabia for the first time.
Through the integration of philosophical thought with practical applications, the conference exemplifies the Kingdom's ongoing commitment to intellectual growth and diversity. Participants engage in transformative conversations that lead to mutual understanding and collaboration among global thinkers.
As an integral part of the Quality of Life Program, the conference addresses pertinent societal issues through a philosophical lens. This aligns with core principles of justice, virtue, and happiness that are essential to build thriving communities.
Continuing the Dialogue: Future Sessions
The Riyadh International Philosophy Conference 2024 is set to continue, featuring discussions that explore the confluence of philosophy with religion and science. Attendees can look forward to workshops and panels designed to inspire critical thought and foster meaningful dialogues in the days to come.
Frequently Asked Questions
What is the main theme of the Riyadh International Philosophy Conference 2024?
The conference focuses on "Philosophy and Quality of Life: Existence, Truth, and Goodness," examining how philosophical thought can enhance human well-being.
Who are the notable speakers at the conference?
The event features over 60 renowned thinkers, including Dr. Mohammed bin Hasan Alwan and Dr. Kelly James Clark.
What is the significance of the conference in relation to Saudi Vision 2030?
The conference supports the goals of Saudi Vision 2030 by positioning Riyadh as a global center for philosophical discussions and cultural advancement.
How does philosophy contribute to the quality of life?
Philosophy provides frameworks for understanding justice, virtue, and happiness, essential for nurturing healthy and prosperous communities.
What sessions can attendees expect in the upcoming days?
Future sessions will explore intersections of philosophy with religion and science, along with various workshops aimed at fostering critical thought.

author: 四川日报
title: 川渝联合成立全国首个跨省域新能源汽车消费纠纷调处中心|新能源汽车_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
- 本报讯（四川日报全媒体记者 刘佳）由四川省消委会和重庆市消委会联合成立的川渝新能源汽车消费纠纷
【下载黑猫投诉客户端】调处中心日前在重庆揭牌。这是全国首个跨省域新能源汽车消费纠纷调处中心，也是川渝两地深化协作、推动新能源汽车产业高质量发展和维护消费者合法权益、构建行业新生态的重要举措。该中心将围绕高效解决群众急难愁盼问题，聚焦“就近受理、中心处理、远程调解”跨省域“一站式”纠纷化解模式，制定出台工作导则，从投诉受理、调查取证、调解处置等方面建立全流程标准化规范化工作机制。同时，中心将整合川渝两地优势资源，吸纳技术研发、质量检测等领域专家律师组建专家库，为调处中心提供智力支撑。为切实降低两地消费者维权成本，提升纠纷处置效率，中心还将采用“互联网+”线上多元调处方式，以非现场方式组织当事人双方开展调处工作，真正实现让“数据多跑路、群众少跑腿”。
下一步，川渝两地消委会将以调处中心为核心枢纽，持续完善调处机制，提升服务效能，同时加强与西部地区消费者组织交流合作，推动跨省域消费维权协同联动，全力营造更加安全、放心、满意的消费环境。

author: The Canadian Press
title: 2-year-old son of David Foster wows with drumming talents in viral video
text: [](https://www.cheknews.ca/2-year-old-son-of-david-foster-wows-with-drumming-talents-in-viral-video-1184941/) The two-year-old son of famed Canadian producer David Foster and singer Katharine McPhee is lighting up the internet with his musical talents. In a video posted to TikTok by McPhee and Instagram by Foster, the pair’s son is seen playing an impressive drum solo alongside a recording of Michael Jackson’s song “Rock with You.” Foster, from Victoria, B.C., is seen in the video seated watching his son, bopping his head along to the beat while the two-year-old rocks out on a mini drum set complete with his name, Rennie Foster, splashed across the bass drum. McPhee’s video included the caption “my 2 year old baby is a genius.” Foster, the 74-year-old musician and composer, is a 16-time Grammy winner who was born in Victoria. He married McPhee, a 39-year-old singer and actress who was the runner-up in the 2006 season of American Idol, in 2019. Celebrities like Kristin Chenoweth, Questlove, Nicole Sherzinger, Joey McIntyre, Sharon Stone, Debra Messing, Charlie Puth and others took to the video comments to hype up the young drummer. This report by The Canadian Press was first published Jan. 7, 2024.

author: Sunita Iyer
title: Mumbai Weather Forecast on March 6, 2025: City sizzles amid extreme heatwave advisory
text:
Mumbai Weather Forecast on March 6, 2025: City sizzles amid extreme heatwave advisory
Mumbai Weather Forecast on March 6, 2025: Mumbai experiences scorching heat at 36°C, with severe conditions expected in some areas, prompting authorities to advise precautions.
Image Credit: Getty Images
Mumbai Weather Forecast on March 6, 2025: Mumbai is experiencing soaring temperatures, with the mercury reaching 36°C on Thursday. The city's weather forecast indicates a minimum temperature of 26°C and a maximum of 36°C for the day, along with a relative humidity level of 23% and winds blowing at 19 km/h.
Image Credit: Getty Images
The sun rose at 6:54 AM and is expected to set at 6:45 PM. However, Mumbaikars should brace for excessive heat, with some areas expected to witness severe heat conditions. Authorities have advised residents to take necessary precautions and limit exposure to direct sunlight during peak hours.
Image Credit: Getty Images
Looking ahead to Friday, March 7, Mumbai's temperatures will remain high, with a predicted minimum of 25°C and a maximum of 36°C. The humidity level will hold steady at 23%, continuing the trend of dry and hot conditions across the city.
Also read: Beat the heat: 10 refreshing benefits of eating watermelon
Image Credit: Getty Images
Given the extreme weather, residents are urged to stay hydrated, wear light clothing, and avoid outdoor activities during the hottest parts of the day. Health experts caution against prolonged exposure to the sun, as heat-related illnesses could become a concern.
Image Credit: Getty Images
With the summer heat intensifying, Mumbaikars should stay updated on weather advisories and plan their day accordingly to combat the sweltering conditions.

author: 小浪财讯
title: 券商指数ETF（515850）跌1.73%，半日成交额1117.85万元|券商_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，券商指数ETF（515850）跌1.73%，报1.304元，成交额1117.85万元。券商指数ETF（515850）重仓股方面， 中信证券 截止午盘跌1.55%， 东方财富 跌2.19%， 国泰海通 跌0.65%， 华泰证券 跌1.93%， 招商证券 跌1.31%， 东方证券 跌1.89%， 广发证券 跌1.98%， 申万宏源 跌1.45%， 兴业证券 跌1.66%， 中金公司 跌1.91%。
券商指数ETF（515850）业绩比较基准为 中证全指证券公司指数 收益率，管理人为富国基金管理有限公司，基金经理为殷钦怡，成立（2020-01-21）以来回报为32.58%，近一个月回报为1.51%。

author: F_400991
title: 31 trapped workers rescued in LA tunnel collapse - People's Daily Online
text:
Home>>
31 trapped workers rescued in LA tunnel collapse
Xinhua) 14:36, July 10, 2025
LOS ANGELES, July 9 (Xinhua) -- Thirty-one workers, who were trapped following a tunnel collapse in the Wilmington area of Los Angeles on Wednesday evening, have been rescued, the Los Angeles Fire Department said.
The workers, all believed to be involved in tunnel construction, were found alive and with no visible injuries, the fire agency said, adding that no individuals remain missing.
The incident occurred at around 8 p.m. (0300 GMT Thursday) near the 1700 block of North Figueroa Street in Wilmington.
The fire agency has dispatched emergency resources to the site, including all of its urban search and rescue teams, to conduct rescue operations.
According to the agency, the collapse occurred in an industrial tunnel, with a diameter of 18 feet (5.5 meters), under construction for municipal wastewater management.
The site of the collapse was located approximately 5 to 6 miles (8 to 9.6 km) south of the access point, the only available entry for rescue operations.

author: red/epd
title: Konstanz: Streit um vegetarisches Schulessen: Gericht weist Beschwerden zurück - Baden-Württemberg
text: Streit um vegetarisches Schulessen: Gericht weist Beschwerden zurück 26.06.2025 - 10:42 Uhr An einer Schule im Raum Konstanz wird häufig vegetarisches Schulessen angeboten (Symbolbild). Foto: dpa/Hauke-Christian Dittrich
